title: Introducing: LUNAR
body:
This debut from the currently elusive **LUNAR** is pretty impressive.

On hearing the first few seconds I wrongly assumed it was going to be another middle of the road, Calvin Harris baiting EDM-lite track, however the songwriting at the core of this really blossoms – ending up feeling almost early 00’s R&B influenced, and centred around a killer chorus. Check out _Glad You Stayed_ below.
